com.example.mapnector.MapManagement

Class MapManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.mapnector.MapManagement.MapManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener

    public class MapManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    the job of the class is to handle all the logic required for the location system - to share my location, see others locations, check permissions, update location, clear my data when app stopped, manage both threads etc

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MapManager.LocationGetterThread
      Thread that's aim is to get other groupUsers locations from firebase
      class  MapManager.LocationThread
      Thread that's aim is to update my location data in firebase

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private android.app.Activity activity
      ref to MapsActivtiy
      private FirebaseHelper FBhelper
      ref to FBhelper created in LVhelper
      private com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap
      reference to google map we got asynchronously in MapsActivity
      private android.os.Handler handler
      because when we get others locations in LocationGetterThread we cant update ui, we use handler
      private boolean keepThreadCheckbox
      used in locationThread; one of the 2 variables that if one false LocationThread interrupted; if true we send location to firebase if false we disable the thread that does that and clean our location data in firebase to latitude,longitude = 300,300
      boolean keepThreadPause
      used in locationThread; one of the 2 variables that if one false LocationThread interrupted; in general true, if false means onPause called, and we dont want to share location when app in background
      private MapManager.LocationGetterThread lgt
      Thread that retrieves other group users location in the firebase; if im in groups view(of the left listView) thread off, if clicked on some group thread activated
      private android.location.LocationManager locationManager
      ref to LocationManger we retrieved from MapsActivtiy
      private MapManager.LocationThread lt
      Thread that updates mine location in the firebase; if don't have permission or checkbox to allow that is off thread is disabled
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,FirebaseLocationSystem.DoubleDoubleName> map
      used to store other users location by key - DoubleDoubleName object(when key of the map is the uid of the user we store his location)
      static double mLatitude
      represents mine current location latitude
      static double mLongitude
      represents mine current location longitude
      static int NULL_LOC
      a constant; if latitude or longitude equals to 300(not possible value in real life) so we know users location not available
      private int TICK_TIME_MILLIS
      How many time in milliseconds to sleep in threads; i chose 5000 milliseconds but can be easily updated using this variable
      private UIHelper uiHelper
      ref to UIhelper created in MapsActivity

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapManager(android.app.Activity activity, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap, FirebaseHelper FBhelper, android.location.LocationManager locationManager, UIHelper uiHelper)
      here we initialize variables, if we have location permission enable my location in map

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activityResumed()
      this function called if onResume of MapsActivity called; checks whether threads are running, whether to stop them and that stuff
      boolean checkAndRequestLocationPermission()
      checks for location permission, if already granted returns true if not asks for it and returns false
      void chkBoxSendLocClick()
      called when checkBox to send location to firebase clicked; if enabled remains/starts locationThread if false makes keepThreadCheckbox false what will shutdown the thread in 5 seconds(or less)
      void clearMap()
      clear google map from markers
      void considerStartLocationGetterThread()
      if lgt thread isn't working - create a new one and start it, but if its already running do nothing
      void drawMapData()
      handler calls this function(and MapsActivity in some specific cases to not wait 5 seconds before showing data); we iterate the hashMap the FirebaseLocationSystem fills in and add markers to those locations in the googleMap(without marker to our own location)
      void focusCamera(GroupUser gu)
      move camera to the place the GroupUser located; if place unknown do nothing
      com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap getGoogleMap() 
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,FirebaseLocationSystem.DoubleDoubleName> getUsersLocationsMap() 
      void onClick(android.view.View v)
      handles clicks on checkboxes - uiHelper.chkSendLocation(if to send location in general), uiHelper.chkAccessLocation(if allow current group to access location);
      void resetLocation()
      set my location data in firebase as 300 for both variables; requests firebase to update it
      void updateMapType()
      we get there when UpdateMap in menu in MapsActivity is clicked - move to the next map type in the hierarchy

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • NULL_LOC

        public static final int NULL_LOC
        a constant; if latitude or longitude equals to 300(not possible value in real life) so we know users location not available
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TICK_TIME_MILLIS

        private final int TICK_TIME_MILLIS
        How many time in milliseconds to sleep in threads; i chose 5000 milliseconds but can be easily updated using this variable
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • googleMap

        private final com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap
        reference to google map we got asynchronously in MapsActivity

      • FBhelper

        private final FirebaseHelper FBhelper
        ref to FBhelper created in LVhelper

      • locationManager

        private final android.location.LocationManager locationManager
        ref to LocationManger we retrieved from MapsActivtiy

      • lt

        private MapManager.LocationThread lt
        Thread that updates mine location in the firebase; if don't have permission or checkbox to allow that is off thread is disabled

      • lgt

        private MapManager.LocationGetterThread lgt
        Thread that retrieves other group users location in the firebase; if im in groups view(of the left listView) thread off, if clicked on some group thread activated

      • keepThreadCheckbox

        private boolean keepThreadCheckbox
        used in locationThread; one of the 2 variables that if one false LocationThread interrupted; if true we send location to firebase if false we disable the thread that does that and clean our location data in firebase to latitude,longitude = 300,300

      • keepThreadPause

        public boolean keepThreadPause
        used in locationThread; one of the 2 variables that if one false LocationThread interrupted; in general true, if false means onPause called, and we dont want to share location when app in background

      • activity

        private final android.app.Activity activity
        ref to MapsActivtiy

      • handler

        private final android.os.Handler handler
        because when we get others locations in LocationGetterThread we cant update ui, we use handler

      • uiHelper

        private final UIHelper uiHelper
        ref to UIhelper created in MapsActivity

      • mLatitude

        public static double mLatitude
        represents mine current location latitude

      • mLongitude

        public static double mLongitude
        represents mine current location longitude

      • map

        private final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,FirebaseLocationSystem.DoubleDoubleName> map
        used to store other users location by key - DoubleDoubleName object(when key of the map is the uid of the user we store his location)

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapManager

        public MapManager(android.app.Activity activity,
                  com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap,
                  FirebaseHelper FBhelper,
                  android.location.LocationManager locationManager,
                  UIHelper uiHelper)
        here we initialize variables, if we have location permission enable my location in map
        Parameters:
        activity - MapsActivtiy
        googleMap - the map we got async in MapsActivtiy
        FBhelper - ref to FirebaseHelper
        locationManager - ref to LocationManger we got in MapsActivtiy
        uiHelper - ref to UIHelper

    • Method Detail

      • focusCamera

        public void focusCamera(GroupUser gu)
        move camera to the place the GroupUser located; if place unknown do nothing
        Parameters:
        gu - the groupUser to move the camera to

      • updateMapType

        public void updateMapType()
        we get there when UpdateMap in menu in MapsActivity is clicked - move to the next map type in the hierarchy

      • drawMapData

        public void drawMapData()
        handler calls this function(and MapsActivity in some specific cases to not wait 5 seconds before showing data); we iterate the hashMap the FirebaseLocationSystem fills in and add markers to those locations in the googleMap(without marker to our own location)

      • checkAndRequestLocationPermission

        public boolean checkAndRequestLocationPermission()
        checks for location permission, if already granted returns true if not asks for it and returns false
        Returns:
        true if location permission already granted before and false otherwise

      • activityResumed

        public void activityResumed()
        this function called if onResume of MapsActivity called; checks whether threads are running, whether to stop them and that stuff

      • chkBoxSendLocClick

        public void chkBoxSendLocClick()
        called when checkBox to send location to firebase clicked; if enabled remains/starts locationThread if false makes keepThreadCheckbox false what will shutdown the thread in 5 seconds(or less)

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        handles clicks on checkboxes - uiHelper.chkSendLocation(if to send location in general), uiHelper.chkAccessLocation(if allow current group to access location);
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener
        Parameters:
        v - the clicked view

      • considerStartLocationGetterThread

        public void considerStartLocationGetterThread()
        if lgt thread isn't working - create a new one and start it, but if its already running do nothing

      • clearMap

        public void clearMap()
        clear google map from markers

      • resetLocation

        public void resetLocation()
        set my location data in firebase as 300 for both variables; requests firebase to update it

      • getGoogleMap

        public com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap getGoogleMap()

      • getUsersLocationsMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,FirebaseLocationSystem.DoubleDoubleName> getUsersLocationsMap()
